input: In which country will the 2019 Rugby Union World Cup be played?

In Greek mythology, how many heads does Cerberus, the dog who guards the entrance to Hades, usually have?

How many valves does a trumpet have?
How many Bond themes did Shirley Bassey sing

June 5, 2004 saw the death of what man, the 40th President of the United States?

Which European country has the same flag as Chad - a blue, yellow and red tricolour?
In humans, microcephaly is having an abnormally small what?
